text: Kasone, ki guftand: "Hamono Alloh az mo pajmon giriftaast, to ʙa heç pajomʙare imon najovarem, magar in ki qurʙonie ʙaroi mo ʙijovarad, ki otaş onro ʙixurad". Ba jahudijon ʙigu ej Muhammad: "Pajomʙarone peş az man ʙo daloili ravşan va ʙo cize ki gufted, omadand, pas caro şumo onhoro kuşted (monandi Zakarijo va Jahjo va digar pajomʙaronro,) agar rost megued
